medical_history.history_of_present_illness: 2 days of right upper quadrant abdominal pain, intermittent, severe. No fever, cough, chest pain, shortness of breath, nausea/vomiting/diarrhea. Poor oral intake.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Acne, iron-deficiency anemia, anxiety, gastroesophageal reflux disease, low back pain, restless leg syndrome
medical_history.family_history: Father with heart disease; mother underwent total abdominal hysterectomy with removal of ovaries due to a precancerous condition.
